item.title: GitHub Pages-Starter Pack
item.description: Github makes it easy to get started, with the click of a button, you can have a web-page live, requiring only markdown skills (that anyone can learn on the go). Each feature you want to enable requires a little more learning, and GitHub Pages is set up so that if you decide to, you can gradually progress from content creator to web-developer.

item.title: GitHub Pages-Extended Resources
item.description: All those extra things you’ll need to know.
